characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once per battle, instead of making a normal move with the Solitaire, you can make a Blitz move with it. If you do so, add 2D6" to the model's Move characteristic for this turn. In addition, the model's Attack characteristic is increased to 10 for the rest of the turn. This ability may not be used if the model has been selected as the target of the "Twilight Pathways" psychic power in the previous Psychic Phase.
